title: Stand Firm Ye Boys from Maine: The 20th Maine and the Gettysburg Campaign
description: If you saw the movie Gettysburg then you know about Joshua Chamberlain and the men who fought with him on Little Round Top. This is the complete story of the famous 20th Maine from June 21 through July 10, 1863, using more than 70 first-hand accounts.
author: Thomas A. Desjardin
